mapper.select: SELECT member_id, email, password, phone, address, nickname, park, building_elevator_num, floor, area, rooms, bathrooms, created FROM members WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members(email, password, phone, address, nickname, park, building_elevator_num, floor, area, rooms, bathrooms) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{nickname}, #{park}, #{buildingElevatorNum}, #{floor}, #{area}, #{rooms}, #{bathrooms});
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET email=#{email}, password=#{password}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, nickname=#{nickname}, park=#{park}, building_elevator_num=#{buildingElevatorNum}, floor=#{floor}, area=#{area}, rooms=#{rooms}, bathrooms=#{bathrooms} WHERE member_id=#{memberId}
